Title: Eddie Murphy: Raw
Writer: Eddie Murphy (stand-up material), Eddie Murphy (opening sketch), Keenen Ivory Wayans (opening sketch)
Actors: Eddie Murphy, Tatyana Ali, Billie Allen, Clebert Ford
Plot: After achieving fame with Saturday Night Live and Beverly Hills Cop, Eddie Murphy released a film version of one of his live stand-up performances. He mainly focuses on the topics of divorce and relations between the sexes, but also goes into some of the problems he's encountered because of fame, including offended listeners and fans who continually greet him with his unprintable catch phrases.
